roleset.name: to increase
roleset.note: RAMP_UP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ramp' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from ramp.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: `` A key part of the question is , how soon does this disk-drive come [*T*-1] and how soon does production ramp up [*T*-2]? '' said [*T*-3] Steve Cohen at SoundView Financial Group .
